Fayetteville.Fayetteville Academy:
The Fayetteville Academy was established in 1970 as a coeducational secular private school in Cumberland County.


== History ==
The Fayetteville Academy opened in September 1970 under the leadership of the first headmaster, Joseph Lassiter, with approximately 100 students in grades 1-10. During the first year the entire school was housed in what is today the Lower School.
